metadata.title: CVE-2024-4741 on Ubuntu 22.04 FIPS Compliant (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
Use After Free with SSL_free_buffers

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-4741` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libssl3 - 3.0.2-0ubuntu1.17
openssl - 3.0.2-0ubuntu1.17
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openssl package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.2-0ubuntu1.17').
nodejs package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
edk2 package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
